Many large banks in India have seized the wealth of hard working Indian citizens recently.  These people aren’t allowed to withdraw their money out of the bank, except for small amounts over the next 6 months.  Bitcoin isn’t about speculation. It is freedom to millions globally.

Bitcoin is different things to different people.  When you’re worried about your assets being seized or becoming inaccessible to you, Bitcoin’s non-seizability becomes very attractive.  This aspect of Bitcoin just became important for 1+ billion people in India & Hong Kong.  https://t.co/nLLaUlRpBz

Reports are surfacing that some Hong Kong ATMs have run out of cash as withdrawals are accelerating with increased protests and instability.   Imagine not being able to access your own money.  Bitcoin fixes this.

Reserve Bank of India tweeted, “banking system is safe and stable and there is no need to panic”.  Meanwhile, 900,000 people in India were just told they could only withdraw $140 TOTAL for the next six months.  Bitcoin isn't a get-rich-quick scheme, it's a get-free-quick scheme.
